message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am willing to offer the product to you for $14000. This price reflects the value I place on it while ensuring you receive a great deal considering its worth to you. Let me know if this proposal works for you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective on the product's value to you. In light of that, I would like to propose a price of $13800 for the product. This offer aims to be fair to both parties, reflecting the product's worth to you while also considering my position. I hope you find this proposal acceptable.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13200. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. Considering your valuation of the product, I am willing to offer the product to you for $13500. This price reflects a balance between the product's worth to you and the value I place on it. I hope this offer meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
I appreciate your continued willingness to work with me, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

I understand your position, Bob. In an effort to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am willing to offer the product to you for $13300. This price reflects a compromise that acknowledges the product's value to you while also considering my position. I hope this revised offer is more in line with what you're looking for.
